title: High Maternal Risk
short_description: Consult with a maternal-fetal medicine specialist
description: Consult with a maternal-fetal medicine specialist (perinatologist) to manage high-risk pregnancies effectively. These specialists have the expertise to handle complex pregnancy conditions and provide the necessary care for both mother and baby.

title: Medium Maternal Risk
short_description: During a medium-risk regular maternal checkup must
description: Schedule and attend regular prenatal check-ups with your obstetrician-gynecologist (OB/GYN). Regular monitoring helps in early detection and management of any potential issues to ensure the health and well-being of both mother and baby.

title: Low Maternal Risk Health
short_description: Attend prenatal check-ups when it is needed
description: Regular prenatal check-ups with your obstetrician-gynecologist (OB/GYN) are important for monitoring the health and development of both you and your baby. These appointments help ensure that any potential issues are identified early and addressed promptly.
